visualization_prompt: Create a 3D column chart using Highcharts with the following specifications: Chart type: 3D column, Chart title: 'Sold passenger cars in Norway by brand, May 2024', Axes and labels styling: X-axis labels should be in Arial font, size 12, and color #333333; Y-axis labels should be in Arial font, size 12, and color #333333; Title should be in Helvetica font, size 18, and color #000000; Subtitle should be in Arial font, size 14, and color #666666. Data series: One series with data points for car brands and their respective sales numbers. Custom colors: Use Highcharts default colors for the series. Additional configurations: Enable 3D options with default settings, disable the legend, and set the tooltip to display the car brand and the number of cars sold.

title.text: Sold passenger cars in Norway by brand, May 2024

visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts configuration object is designed to render a 3D column chart that visualizes the number of passenger cars sold in Norway by brand for the month of May 2024. The chart is configured to use the 'column' type with 3D options enabled, providing a visual depth effect. The title of the chart is styled with a larger font size and a different font family compared to the subtitle and axis labels, ensuring clear differentiation. The X and Y axis labels are styled consistently with a specific font and color, enhancing readability. The tooltip is customized to display the car brand and the corresponding sales number when hovering over a column. The legend is disabled as there is only one series of data, and the series data is color-coded by point, using Highcharts' default color palette. The chart also includes interactive sliders to adjust the 3D view settings dynamically.
